titles.title: Major League Play Ball Act
To apply arbitration to major league baseball, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Major League Play Ball Act - Subjects the dispute between the major league baseball owners and players to binding arbitration. Establishes an arbitration board to resolve all issues between the parties and render a binding decision to replace their agreement which expired on December 31, 1993.
